name: Single filer at low income in Geneva (2026)
description: Single person earning CHF 45,000 in Geneva canton (high-tax)

sources.description: Geneva has relatively high cantonal/municipal taxes. Taxable income for federal: 45000 - 2880 - 5000 = 37120. Federal tax ~174 CHF. Cantonal/Municipal 10% of gross for low income. Social 6.4%.
